label: Off-Campus Internship
description: Supervised, off-campus experience in a field directly pertaining to a subject matter in agricultural and consumer economics. Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule. Approved for S/U grading only. May be repeated up to 4 hours in a semester, to a maximum of 10 hours. Prerequisite: Sophomore standing, cumulative GPA of 2. 5 or above at the time the internship is arranged, and consent of instructor.
